name: Dungeon Defence Demo
description:
If you have UI bugs please download the game for a better experince. I am working on the fix for the UI and will update when I can

This is a game I wanted to make and it was fun making it.

Its a basic tower defence with 4 towers that can upgrade once and with three levels.

The green one is a lot easier since it has a lot more space to place turrets where as the grey one is harder since it is smaller

The Aim is to complete 100 waves on each level, you can continue after to see how far you can get

CONTROLS: Pause: Escape P: Lose Level Please leave any feedback to improve, I would love to improve this as much as I can.
